entry.title: Combined summary - Fwd: Re: [RFC] Canonical input and output ordering in transactions
entry.summary: Rusty Russell and Jorge Timón discussed Canonical Input and Output ordering in transactions. During the conversation, Jorge Timón brought up pay2contract commitments that do not use OP_RETURN. Rusty requested an explanation, which was provided by Jorge through code from Blockstream's contracthashtool. The code can be used to permute a transaction based on some secret. Rusty suggested creating an informational BIP with simple code as plan B, but Jorge preferred plan A.
